original_text: And there they were with David three days, eating and drinking: for their brethren had prepared for them.
korean_text: 무리가 거기서 다윗과 함께 사흘을 지내며 먹고 마셨으니 이는 그들의 형제가 이미 식물을 준비하였음이며

sentences.original_text: And there they were with David
for their brethren had prepared for them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 형제들이 그들을 위해 준비했기 때문이었다
